free_text.Content: [i]Lectures:[/i][br/]- History of Photography[br/]- Physical Image Formation[br/]- Human Vision System[br/]- Light, Light Sources, and Photometry[br/]- Geometric Optics[br/]- Image Sampling and Quantization[br/]- Basic Image Filtering (Convolution, Fourier Domain)[br/]- Sensor Characteristics (Pixel size, Dynamic Range, Noise Resolution, OECF, CFA)[br/]- Incamera Processing[br/]- Encoding, Compression and File Formats[br/]- Displays[br/][br/][i]Exercises :[/i][br/]The exercises consist of implementing some of the topics discussed in class using Matlab and the students' own images.
